name: His Quest (Silasmakegame)
description:
A voice in your head commands you. That voice is Jesus! Fight the evil Hatlived with your divine gift. But have you passed the test? Will Jesus be pleased with your actions or will he banish you to the underground. Sound effects are all made with my mouth.

controls:

wasd = movement

shift = sprint

left mouse = attack

space = interact 

space again = interact again
